attributes.title: ❤️✨𝓝𝓸✨❤️
attributes.review: I was just building my shrine and adding to the 💫beauty💫 of trump like always, when I heard the notification that my fabulous oranges app had been downloaded! I was preparing to sacrifice another fuzzy pig to him when I heard a wonderful knock on my door. I opened it, it was my orange emperor himself! 😌🥰🍊 he looked at me, I looked at him, and then I fell so hard that I yeeted  myself past the boarder!! I’m telling you, I tried to ✨𝓼𝓬𝓻𝓮𝓪𝓶✨ bur my Head was ✨𝓾𝓷𝓭𝓮𝓻𝔀𝓪𝓽𝓮𝓻✨, and then I got suffocated by Lucifer himself! I fought him with all I could, and am currently hiding in a ww2 bunker. So in conclusion, don’t use this app, you might end up like me.. 🧚✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: EW
attributes.review: So basically I wanted to show sooo much support for our president I would download the app! ✨✨HOWEVER the moment I downloaded it, MILLIONS of cockroaches came out of the screen! I don't know why but obviously it is a SERIOUS problem! And then it showed a fat pig in a suit with a yellow mop on its head. I don't think this app is safe enough for adults so I would definitely not recommend it. Fix this cockroach issue please. ✨🧚‍♂️I'd also like to point out it started raining broccoli and it's OBVIOUSLY the apps fault because it just rained broccoli outside and it was so terrible and it was such a waste of food. Anyways, have a great day ✨🧚‍♂️😌

attributes.title: This phone cause a virus
attributes.review: A virus on my phone? Yes. A virus on my heart? Yes:(. I downloaded this application to see what trumpa-lumpa was dippity wippity up to and my phone got a virus. So sad. I went to get it fixed and as soon as the guy fixing my phone opened it, he burned his finger!!! My phone was literally in fire. The guy told me to never come again and that he will be sending me his doctors bill for my phone. And the was cheeto ruined our healthcare, the bill is expensive. I had to sell my home to be able to pay for the guys bill and me and my cat were homeless. Just don’t download the app, causes virus physical and emotionally.

This app took far to long to download.. and when it did download I STARTED HEARING NOISES FROM MY PHONE! And when I would close the app it would still sound like someone was breathing into my phone ☎️ but I just didn’t understand so I tried deleting the app and it wouldn’t delete at first! I’m was FREEZING out and I had to go 
Teach my fish how to walk ✨✨ anywho when I deleted this app the noises STOPPED coming out of my phone.. THIS IS SO SCARY! This app needs some software updates too!! It made my phone beyond laggy! KAREN would be quaking right now✨✨ this app wouldn’t let me be a savage, classy, bougie or ratchet! And it was upsetting me 🥺😕😖

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I can’t believe I ever spent $0.00 on this horrible app. It took months to download and when I finally opened the app, instead of seeing our leader, I was taken to a satanist cult app. I was terrified. My Christian beliefs and values do not feel safe. I can not believe they would have an app like this. My future wife and kids can not be grown up around this app at all. I am BEGGING the Apple company to please take it down. This is beyond horrible. On top of all of this, they keep asking for $0.00! I don’t have that money just lying around. I work hard for every cent I got and to be treated like this? Unacceptable.

attributes.title: There was paranormal activity 😳
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app bc it’s the orange. But after I downloaded it, I felt so strange. I looked to my right and I see a ghost with an orange tint. It was very creepy. It looked like something you’d see in The Conjuring movies. It kept chanting “Trump 2020” and “Rate five stars” and “Vote Trump” and when I refused to, chairs were being thrown at me. This was the most HORRIFYING thing I’ve ever experienced. This app has haunted me and NO ONE bothered to believe me. So not only did this app cause me to have a very traumatic experience with the ghosts but it also caused EMBARRASSMENT bc no one believed me about the evil spirits that came into MY LIFE bc of this ✨STUPID✨ app.

attributes.title: Unbelievable.
attributes.review: So I heard on the news that the Generation Z was trying to take this off of the application store and I decided that I should give this application a 5 star review to save it.  First I had to download the application to give it a review but it took 3 hours to download. And I have stable WiFi. I try to help you but you make it 3 hours to download? Now I’m starting to get why the Generation Z hates the bunker boy. Orange man has lots of money but can’t afford to make a decent application. Unbelievable. Very unbelievable. Now I do not expect any changes because I already left the review that I needed to leave.

attributes.title: do not get omygosh gross 😡🤢😔 so much bad luck
attributes.review: it brought me so much bad luck. so so I went to walk my dog 🐕 and then a bird 🦅 flew at me and then I ended up stabbing my cat 🐱 so while driving 🚗 to the vet the doctor 👩‍⚕️ said I had scoliosis so on my was yo get the cast I fell into the ocean 🌊 and drowned but then I got thirsty 💦 so I walked to the fridge just to find out I was out of eggs 🥚 but then while remembering I’m vegan I started to kill a cow 🐄 and then I forgot I left the dryer on and I ended up flooding my house 🏡 and then the apartment landlord kicked 🦵 me out!!! I will never get this app again!😔😡 anyway remember to be environmentally friendly 🌿♻️ :)

attributes.title: awful. wouldn’t recommend.
attributes.review: this app is actually a socialist trick. the left is at it again, slapping My President’s name on a false app made to promote communism to our young, impressionable children. my daughter downloaded this app, as i requested, hoping to ensure My President won his next election (Trump 2020!!), but when i checked in with her about it the next day, she told me she thought Trump was “a terrible man” and sided with that filthy commie Bernie Sanders!!! now she wants to dye her hair and turn away from our lord God!! disgusting. horrific liberal propaganda has invaded even the spaces we once held sacred. i wouldn’t wish this app on my worst enemy.

attributes.title: BuNkEr BoI
attributes.review: This is my first ever review bc I hate this app so much it’s so hurtful and hateful 🥺😡🤬 I’m very concerned about the number of illnesses trump probably has😪😪 he is selling merch for a cult and trying to spread Covid 🤕🤢🤮😵😑 and then more people die bc of a criminal with a Cheeto skin tone. Tbh I don’t even want to disrespect Cheeto with comparing it to bunker boi🤡🤮👹👺👿😈💩🎃😻🤖👽😽👹🤖. I hope his son Barron escapes and saves his brain cells.  Also sorry melania for only marrying him to get money when he died( I know ur waiting for the Simpson’s prediction to come true) but now ur the First Lady and regret ur existence, anyway get that dough. 😾😾😽😼🙌👍👏😸😻👐🏻🤧😪🥴😵😷😴🥱🤒😐😥😧😥😯🤬😳🥶😫😳🥺😱😟🤪🤪😎🤩😏😂😝☺️😘😃😃😄😁😁😁
